@OregonJOBS2 Thanks for this. Someone sent it to me because I asked for a pick-me-up after a bad day dealing with my deceased mother's estate. I really really appreciate you taking the time to make it. RIP sweet kitten.
@mtnbvan OMG sounds amazing!! I would LOVE to be in a spider paradise! I intensely dislike centipedes though, so that's my one reluctance to go to Australia.

I don't care about the reviews, I'm super-excited about this movie. Loved #Unbreakable, which was a masterpiece in its own right. âš¡ï¸ â€œReviews are split on M. Night Shyamalan's Glassâ€

RT @TheOtherScottM: Glass is M. Nightâ€™s love letter to comic books featuring one of the best Samuel L. Jackson performances in a long time.â€¦

@TheOtherScottM @MNightShyamalan @jason_blum @blumhouse @UniversalPics I LOVED Unbreakable. Honestly I think that if it had been his first movie it would have been received much better by critics. Truly, nothing can ever match The 6th Sense... it should have been his 10th movie, not his first.
@Gustav_Swart Yeah... I honestly don't know how I'm even doing it. I am still not 100% convinced it CAN be done.

@astronamir @OhShaun @starstrickenSF @Astropartigirl The teacher said she'd gotten 19/20, and I thought I'd tanked. But then he said he had one better essay that beat out the previous one because it said all the same things in half the number of words. Imagine my shock when it was mine!

@astronamir @OhShaun @starstrickenSF @Astropartigirl Can I just interrupt to say that I'm having a happy deja vu reading this? I got 19.5/20 on an in-class essay in HS that was on the life and death of a star on the main sequence. I was the first to finish, and my study-mate had her essay read aloud.
